title: Isacar.io Finance Management Platform
description: Complete financial management system with transactions, budgets, recurring bills, and analytics

requirements.title: Recurring Bills Management
requirements.description: Users should be able to manage recurring bills with inline editing, calendar picker for due dates, and add/delete functionality without page reloads
acceptance_criteria: User can add a new recurring bill
User can edit bill name, amount, due day, and category inline
User can select due day using calendar picker
No page reloads occur during any interaction
New bills appear at the bottom in creation order
Calendar picker is visible and functional on mobile

requirements.title: Inline Editing
requirements.description: All editable fields should support inline editing similar to Notion/Excel
acceptance_criteria: Clicking on a field enters edit mode
Changes are saved on blur or Enter key

requirements.title: Mobile Responsiveness
requirements.description: All components should be fully responsive and functional on mobile devices
acceptance_criteria: Calendar picker is accessible on mobile
All interactive elements are properly sized for touch
Layout adapts correctly to small screens

requirements.title: State Management
requirements.description: Application should use efficient state management without unnecessary data reloads
acceptance_criteria: Local state is updated immediately after operations
No unnecessary API calls during interactions
